channel.title: Toby Hadoke's Who's Round
channel.itunes:author: Toby Hadoke
channel.itunes:summary: In honour of the 50th anniversary of Doctor Who in 2013, Toby Hadoke has embarked on an epic quest.
channel.description: In honour of the 50th anniversary of Doctor Who in 2013, Toby Hadoke has embarked on an epic quest: interview someone from every single Doctor Who story. Feeling Doctors or companions are a bit too easy, he travels the country meeting legends of the show's history both in front of and behind the camera, and chats to them about both Doctor Who itself and the lives his interview subjects have led since (and, indeed, before).The interviews are in the form of podcasts on the Big Finish website, which you can download or stream here, or subscribe to on iTunes. All episodes are free, so if you've enjoyed Toby's chat, all he asks is that you give a donation to a charity nominated by the interview subject.

item.title: Doctor Who: Toby Hadoke's Who's Round 9 (February #10)
item.itunes:summary: In the latest chapter of his Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone connected with every single Doctor Who story, Toby Hadoke drops in on a man who met the Daleks and still came back to the series for more!
item.description: In the latest chapter of his Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone connected with every single Doctor Who story, Toby Hadoke drops in on a man who met the Daleks and still came back to the series for more!
item.itunes:author: Toby Hadoke

item.title: Doctor Who: Toby Hadoke's Who's Round 10 (March #2)
item.itunes:summary: In a brand new chapter of his Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone connected with every single Doctor Who story, Toby Hadoke encounters another man who's met the Daleks - but in which era?
item.description: In a brand new chapter of his Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone connected with every single Doctor Who story, Toby Hadoke encounters another man who's met the Daleks - but in which era?

item.title: Doctor Who: Toby Hadoke's Who's Round 11 (April #1)
item.itunes:summary: In the latest part of his Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone connected with every single Doctor Who story, Toby Hadoke spends time in the company of four people who all worked on one legendary early story...
item.description: In the latest part of his Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone connected with every single Doctor Who story, Toby Hadoke spends time in the company of four people who all worked on one legendary early story...
item.itunes:author: Toby Hadoke

item.title: Doctor Who, Competitions and Listener Questions (April #2)
item.itunes:summary: Before heading off for a trip to the other side of the world, Nick Briggs found a bit of time to record a new podcast with Paul Spragg - where they announce the winners of the latest competition!
item.description: Before heading off for a trip to the other side of the world, Nick Briggs found a bit of time to record a new podcast with Paul Spragg - where they announce the winners of the latest competition!
item.itunes:author: Toby Hadoke

item.title: Doctor Who: Toby Hadoke's Who's Round 12 (April #3)
item.itunes:summary: In a brand new instalment of his Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone connected with every single Doctor Who story, Toby Hadoke gets a two-for-one deal thanks to a pair of people with ties to the very earliest years of Doctor Who.
item.description: In a brand new instalment of his Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone connected with every single Doctor Who story, Toby Hadoke gets a two-for-one deal thanks to a pair of people with ties to the very earliest years of Doctor Who.
item.itunes:author: Toby Hadoke

item.title: Doctor Who: Toby Hadoke's Who's Round 13 (April #4)
item.itunes:summary: In the latest segment of his Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone connected with every single Doctor Who story, Toby Hadoke gets right up to date...and heads into the future!
item.description: In the latest segment of his Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone connected with every single Doctor Who story, Toby Hadoke gets right up to date...and heads into the future!

item.title: Doctor Who: Toby Hadoke's Who's Round 14 (April #5)
item.itunes:summary: In another instalment of his Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone connected with every single Doctor Who story, Toby Hadoke continues to look behind the scenes...
item.description: In another instalment of his Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone connected with every single Doctor Who story, Toby Hadoke continues to look behind the scenes...

item.title: Doctor Who: Toby Hadoke's Who's Round 15 (April #6)
item.itunes:summary: It's time for a brand new Who's Round, Toby Hadoke's Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone who's been involved with every single Doctor Who story. This time it's a special look at a lost Hartnell story...
item.description: It's time for a brand new Who's Round, Toby Hadoke's Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone who's been involved with every single Doctor Who story. This time it's a special look at a lost Hartnell story...

item.title: Doctor Who: Toby Hadoke's Who's Round 16 (May #1)
item.itunes:summary: It's the latest Who's Round, Toby Hadoke's Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone who's been involved with every single Doctor Who story! This time, Toby makes across the water to chat to a man whose credits include both Doctor Who and The A-Team.
item.description: It's the latest Who's Round, Toby Hadoke's Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone who's been involved with every single Doctor Who story! This time, Toby makes across the water to chat to a man whose credits include both Doctor Who and The A-Team.

item.title: Doctor Who: Toby Hadoke's Who's Round 17 (May #3)
item.itunes:summary: It's a brand new Who's Round, Toby Hadoke's Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone who's been involved with every single Doctor Who story! This edition, Toby talks to a miner celebrity.
